trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> is not able to complete a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*> operation to a particular recipient.
trans-unit.target: Representa a exceção que é lançada quando o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> não é possível concluir uma <> </> *> ou <> </> *> operação para um destinatário específico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância vazia do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro especificada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor usa o `message` parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the error message.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém a mensagem de erro.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified status code and e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> classe com o endereço de email e o código de status especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `failedRecipient` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor usa o `statusCode` parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>propriedade e usa o `failedRecipient` parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o endereço de email.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> classe a partir de instâncias especificadas de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classes.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface para a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException>classe.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem e destino do fluxo serializado que está associado com a nova instância.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe com a exceção interna e mensagens de erro especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que descreve o erro que ocorreu.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é a causa da exceção atual.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified status code, e-mail address, and server response.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> classe com o código de status especificado, o endereço de email e a resposta do servidor.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `failedRecipient` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor usa o `statusCode` parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>propriedade e usa o `failedRecipient` parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException.FailedRecipient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o endereço de email.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the server response.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém a resposta do servidor.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message, e-mail address, and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro especificada, o endereço de email e a exceção interna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que descreve o erro que ocorreu.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o endereço de email.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é a causa da exceção atual.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the e-mail address with delivery difficulties.
trans-unit.target: Indica o endereço de email com dificuldades de entrega.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o endereço de email.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância com os dados que são necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Any objects that are included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos que estão incluídos no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automaticamente são rastreadas e serializado pelo formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para popular com dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que especifica o destino desta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância com os dados que são necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance, which holds the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância, que contém os dados serializados para o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instance that contains the destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>instância que contém o destino do fluxo serializado que está associado com o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
